com.effy.pdfbox.boxable

Class PdfCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.effy.pdfbox.boxable.PdfCell

  • public class PdfCell
extends Object
    Creates a pdfCell in a table. This cell needs to be added in pdf Row.

    averma
